text: You can see it any time you like, he told me. The sooner the better. If you can get to Bletcham this evening I'll run you up there in the car. That's very nice of you. Nice, nothing. I told you, I'm mad about boats. Seven thirty do you?
handwritten_text: You can see it any time you like, he told me. The sooner the better. If you can get to Bletcham this evening I'll run you up there in the car. That's very nice of you. Nice, nothing. I told you, I'm mad about boats. Seven thirty do you?
